navigation.label: Karen
navigation.title: The Philosopher Queen
navigation.content: The organizational backbone of the operation. While others are busy writing spaghetti code, Karen is decoding the nature of existence at the University of Alberta. Her diet is a strict regime of Coke Zero and cigarettes, punctuated only by a profound love for all bakery itemsâ€”especially bread. She brings a level of sophistication to the household that is otherwise entirely absent.

navigation.label: Sudo
navigation.title: Command Line Canine
navigation.content: Born October 10, 2025. Sudo does not beg; she communicates a critical system need for human food through the deployment of her beautiful eyes. She is a good girl, 100% of the time, efficiently executing commands to sit and stay (mostly when food is involved).

navigation.label: Higgs
navigation.title: The Boson Bark
navigation.content: Born October 10, 2025. The particle that gives the household mass. Higgs possesses an exuberant, boundless energy and a lust for life that is unparalleled. He is responsible for binding the family together through sheer chaotic energy and an inability to understand the concept of 'personal space'.

navigation.label: Aaron
navigation.title: Error 404: Competence Not Found
navigation.content: The self-proclaimed 'architect' who thinks using a strongly-typed language is a personality trait. He maintains lofty ideas of how software design patterns are broken by the 'lego-nature' of assembling software, dreaming of a world where everyone codes properly. He is likely to be found yelling at a cloud provider about data sovereignty while his own local server uptime hovers around 80%.
